import React from 'react' import { userLogin } from '../reducers/userReducer' const LoginForm = () => { const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const username = e.target.username.value const password = e.target.password.value const login = { username, password } userLogin(login) e.target.username.value = '' e.target.password.value = '' } return(

Login to the application TEST

) } export default LoginForm
